ddl_create: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS oasisreport (xmlns TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (xmlns));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messageheader (timedate TEXT, source TEXT, version TEXT, oasisreport_xmlns TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_xmlns) REFERENCES oasisreport(xmlns), PRIMARY KEY (timedate, source, version));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS messagepayload (id TEXT, oasisreport_xmlns TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (oasisreport_xmlns) REFERENCES oasisreport(xmlns), PRIMARY KEY (id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS rto (name TEXT, messagepayload_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (messagepayload_id) REFERENCES messagepayload(id), PRIMARY KEY (name));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_item (id TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (id));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_header (report TEXT, tz TEXT, system TEXT, interval TEXT, mkt_type TEXT, sec_per_interval INTEGER, uom TEXT, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (report, tz, system, interval, mkt_type, sec_per_interval, uom));

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS report_data (resource_name TEXT, data_item TEXT, interval_num INTEGER, value REAL, interval_end_gmt TEXT, opr_date TEXT, interval_start_gmt TEXT, id TEXT, report_item_id TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (report_item_id) REFERENCES report_item(id), PRIMARY KEY (resource_name, data_item, interval_num, value, interval_end_gmt, opr_date, interval_start_gmt, id));
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS disclaimer_item (disclaimer TEXT, rto_name TEXT, FOREIGN KEY (rto_name) REFERENCES rto(name), PRIMARY KEY (disclaimer));
